svg.text: Feather RP2040 + RFM95 LoRa (PID 5714) - Pinout Reference
Component Side (top view) - USB at top - Source: Adafruit PrettyPins
RED wire: 3.3V (left pin 2) to GPS VIN
BLACK wire: GND (left pin 4) to GPS GND
GREEN wire: RX/GP1 (left pin 14) from GPS TX
YELLOW wire: TX/GP0 (left pin 15) to GPS RX
Feather TX (GP0) connects to GPS RX
Feather RX (GP1) connects to GPS TX
